column1: Pull my heart out of my chest
column2: 把我的心脏从我的胸膛中抽出
column3: Train my mind so I forget
column4: 把我的思维训练得善于忘记
column5: Sink your teeth into my bones
column6: 把你的牙齿刺入我的骨髓
column7: Dig me out then fill the hole
column8: 把我从坟墓中掘出，填上掘开的洞
column11: Tear me apart and watch it burn
column15: Tear me apart and watch it burn
column17: All that's left is a window to my soul
column18: 剩下的只是通向我灵魂的窗户
column19: Come and get it one more time
column21: Come and get it one more time (whoa)
column23: If you wanna lose your mind (whoa oh)
column24: 如果你想失掉你的理智的话（喔~哦~）

column33: Mouth to mouth I breathe you in
column34: 嘴对嘴，我把你融进我的呼吸里
column37: Let it drown inside my veins
column38: 让它在我的血管中被吞没
column39: The sweetest poison I could take
column40: 我可以服下的最可口的毒药
column43: The way that you scar with every word
column44: 你让每句话都留下伤疤
column45: But before we reach the end
column46: 但是在我们到达尽头之前
